body:
So yeah.. because you guys liked my creepypasta and I love writing... I'll be doing some fanfics if you want me too... It can be a clan fanfic, a romance fanfic, etc etc. I'll send you a pdf or the text itself via skype. 
Idk if anyone actually cares or not.... but if I got some requests that'd be cool :/
